001package ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port;
002
003/**
004 * Metrics abstraction for recording counters and distribution samples.
005 *
006 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
007 */
008public interface MetricsPort {
009  /**
010   * Increments the named counter by one.
011   *
012   * @param key metric identifier scoped by the caller; must not be {@code null}
013   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
014   */
015  void increment(String key);
016
017  /**
018   * Records an observation for a histogram/gauge style metric.
019   *
020   * @param key metric identifier scoped by the caller
021   * @param value observed numeric value; interpretation defined by the caller
022   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
023   */
024  void observe(String key, long value);
025
026  /**
027   * Metrics implementation that ignores all updates.
028   *
029   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
030   */
031  MetricsPort NO_OP = new MetricsPort() {
032    @Override public void increment(String key) {}
033    @Override public void observe(String key, long value) {}
034  };
035}
